name: Snowman
overview: A single player, festive crosshairs-shooter published in Game On 1992/12, and in Tiger-Crew-Disk #09 (1994/12). You are Tom, the last bastion of hope against the Snowmen horde. Your parents were killed by the Abominable Snowman, these are his evil minions. The evil snowmen can't keep a grin for long and will soon show their horrible grimace. Hit them with your icy projectiles! Bonus points for hitting Santa if he has a green pressie.
